comments.content: Compared to this oil sands business the old way actually is easier on the eyes—maybe. Flickr meet sounds fun.
It's actually a pretty small rig, and wooden construction at that. The local Flickr folks are a real nice bunch, and tolerant of me and my little point-and-shoot. ;-)

Ah... Winter in Alberta. That sky with absolutely no humidity to take the edge off the coldness of it's blue.

-=®=-
